title.native: 社長、バトルの時間です！
title.english: Shachibato! President, It's Time for Battle!

description:
Minato has become the new president of the Kibou Company. In order to be a good president and help the company grow, he must lead his party of adventurers through the Gate and collect Kirakuri — a type of energy that is extremely valuable and fundamental to the city of Gatepia. However, there are other companies vying for the chance to gather the Kirakuri.

(Source: Funimation)

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

name.native: エルセ・アストラーザ

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YukaliHashimoto) | [Blog (jp)](http://blog.livedoor.jp/marianne_amplifier/)

She is a composer, arranger and synthesizer programmer.

__Height:__ 148 cm
__Hobbies:__ Traveling alone, sky watching, watching movies
__Skills & Abilities:__ Basketball

[Profile (Sigma 7)](https://sigma7.co.jp/actors/ichinose_kana) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ichinose_1220) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ichinose_kana1220/)

Won the 18th Annual Seiyū award as Best Lead Actor.

**Non-anime roles:**
• Mimi - Memento Mori (VG)
• Layla - THE iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls (VG)
• Hisui - Tsukihime -A piece of blue glass moon- (VN)

__Hobbies:__ Games, eating, tennis, swimming

[Website](https://columbia.jp/wakiazumi) | [Talent Page](https://haikyo.co.jp/profile/profile.php?ActorID=12722) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/azumi_waki) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ajujustaff) | [Instagram (Personal)](https://www.instagram.com/azumi_waki)

On August 10, 2023, she announced on Twitter her marriage to her longtime partner met through a shared hobby of gaming.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
~!
• Charlotte (Genshin Impact)
 • Mem (Honkai: Star rail)!~
A Japanese animator formerly affiliated with [GAINAX](https://anilist.co/studio/6).

Adam Zehner is the vice president of acquisitions and licensing at Funimation. He was born in Perrysburg, a city in Ohio, USA. In 1999, he graduated from The University of Texas at Austin. 

(Source: AniDB)
**Hiro Ooki** is a Japanese animator and animation director.
